title: The Quest
description: A centuries-old secret has now been revealed, but what will it mean for Sebastián and Adriel?Will their love survive and whom can they trust?For Sebastián, everything he thought he knew has been a lie, but for Sienna, it was a lie she was forced to tell in order to protect herself and everyone she holds dear.In the meantime, a new and unexpected ally stands alongside Sienna, ready to do battle, but Zahir is one step ahead of them and has been for some time.But Zahir hides a secret of his own and will use it to try and wrestle power from Queen Sofia.Is there anybody powerful enough to stop him?Join The Quest and find out...
author: Zane Michaelson
